verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: has] called the decision to revoke Paul Manafort 's bail ' tough ' and ' very unfair ' after a federal judge sent the former campaign manager to await trial behind bars .

[ARG0: Donald Trump] has [V: called] [ARG1: the decision to revoke Paul Manafort 's bail] [ARG2: ' tough ' and ' very unfair '] [ARGM-TMP: after a federal judge sent the former campaign manager to await trial behind bars] .
Donald Trump has called the decision to [V: revoke] [ARG1: Paul Manafort 's bail] ' tough ' and ' very unfair ' after a federal judge sent the former campaign manager to await trial behind bars .

Donald Trump has called the decision to revoke Paul Manafort 's bail ' tough ' and ' very unfair ' after [ARG0: a federal judge] [V: sent] [ARG1: the former campaign manager] [ARG2: to await trial behind bars] .
